name: L'Occitane - Soft Hand Trio
description: Indulge in hand care on the go with our trio of 3 x 30ml travel-sized moisturizers. This set includes Verbena Hand Cream, 20% Shea Butter Hand Cream, and Almond Hand Cream. Nourish and protect your hands wherever you are with these convenient, pocket-sized companions.

name: Narcisso Rodriguez All of me, Eau de Parfum 90ml
description: The one-of-a-kind essence of me. all of me… a daring and prismatic floral fragrance, created for a new generation of women who are confident to show their true colors and embrace all that makes them unique.

name: Secrid Vintage Cognac Wallet
description: Slim and stylish, the Secrid Slimwallet Vintage Cognac Silver fits seamlessly into any pocket. Catering to diverse tastes with a range of colors and styles, its open exterior accommodates 6 extra cards, banknotes, and receipts for ultimate convenience.

name: CONTINENTAL MENS QUARTZ WATCH - ER 2813
description:
This hardwearing timepiece comes with a durable stainless steel strap and
a case made of scratch-resistant sapphire crystal, ensuring longevity. It
features Swiss quartz movement for precise timekeeping, and adds style to
your outfits, whether you’re dressing up for a special occasion
or just going with everyday attire. Water-resistant up to 5 ATM.

name: Xerjoff Uden Overdose, Eau de Parfum 50ml
description: Dance upon the waves of the ocean with Uden Overdose, an enchanting fougere fragrance like no other. Exuding power and strength with every note of Uden Overdose Xerjoff, this perfume is inspired by the tempestuous sea, with enticing top notes of lemon and bergamot. A dark heart of ginger, tobacco flowers and coffee leads to a rich base note of amber and musk.

name: Karl Lagerfeld K/Loom Leather Cardholder
description: This stylish and versatile cardholder features a slim profile and is made with careful attention to detail. Four practical slots let you store your cards safely, while a central compartment ensures extra space for bills and receipts. Its exterior is embossed with a subtle yet impressive KARL monogram and a KARL LAGERFELD logo tab.

name: I WANT CHOO EDP 100ML - ER 2824
description: This powerful, seductive feminine fragrance celebrates the playful and confident woman. Built around the fascinating red spider lily, this floral scent combines soft vanilla notes with the sensual vibes of jasmine sambac. It is balanced by the fruity notes of mandarin juice and velvet peach, and comes in a beautiful, gold-capped bottle.

name: TATEOSSIAN LONDON EVIL EYE AND LEATHER BRACELET SET
description: Dating back 5,000 years, the evil eye symbol is said to ward off negative energy. This set has a beaded bracelet crafted out of black agate which features three “evil eyes” made out of multi-coloured resin. It is complemented by a black double-wrap braided leather bracelet, which fastens with an easy-to-use, push button stainless steel clasp finished with signature Tateossian detailing. Slip on for a stylish accent that brings good luck.

name: CARTIER LA PANTHERE EDP 100ML
description: A gorgeous addition to your dressing table, the feminine Cartier La Panthère is a sophisticated floral fragrance that blends delicate gardenia — an inspired choice of central note for a modern perfume — with sensual musky notes and dried fruit.

name: Bally Smart Wallet
description: Travel with peace of mind with this RFID protection-enabled wallet. This latest style features the new Bally logo and a refined leather design, along with the iconic Bally Ribbon on its exterior. It comes with a sturdy aluminium case that holds up to six smooth or five embossed cards, which can be accessed easily via an external lever. It also has extra capacity for cash and two other cards, making it a reliable companion for your trips.

name: RevitaLash® Advanced Eyelash Conditioner 3.5ml
description: Say hello to healthy, luxurious-looking lashes with this multi-award-winning eyelash serum. Developed by physicians, it uses a patented Curl Effect technology to strengthen your lashes, improve their flexibility and shine, and increase their natural curl.

name: LIP TINTS TO LOVE 2020 LIP TINT TRIP REFRESH
description:
Fall in love with your lips with this full-size trio of 
Benefit’s bestselling lip and cheek tints. This set 
includes three gorgeous, vivid shades including 
Lovetint, a fiery-red shade; Benetint, the iconic 
natural rose tint; and Chachatint, a sheer mango 
hue. Wear them alone or mix and match them 
to create your own custom colour. Glide the 
precise applicator across your lips to instantly 
add a vibrant flush to your pout, and apply 
additional layers to build intensity.

name: RevitaLash® Double-Ended Volume Set – Volumizing Primer and Mascara 11ml
description: This convenient two-in-one product primes lashes, and creates dramatic length and volume with a colour-intense mascara that nourishes while you wear.

name: Forest Essentials Soundarya High Performance Cream With 24K Gold & SPF 30 50g
description: Packed with skin-nourishing ingredients like pure cow’s ghee and 24-carat gold, and active ingredients like hyaluronic acid, polyglutamic acid and vitamin C concentrate, this award-winning moisturiser gives you a natural facelift by firming, smoothing and illuminating your skin.

name: Forest Essentials Gulnar – Rose & Carnation Intense Perfume 50ml
description: Take a stroll through the scented gardens of India. Sweet, floral notes of fresh roses and the spicy warm undertone of carnations invite you to go about your day enveloped in a captivating sensory experience.

name: Kilian Paris Angels’ Share Eau de Parfum 50ml
description: This delicious, warming unisex scent opens with a distinctive accord built upon a blend of oak absolute, cinnamon essence and tonka bean absolute. The long-lasting notes of sandalwood, praline and vanilla make for a delicious finish to an exotic concoction.

name: narciso rodriguez For Her Musc Nude Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: A musky, floral and Oriental fragrance. For this new eau de parfum, the iconic Narciso Rodriguez heart of musk is infused with delicate notes of white flowers and rich tonka bean. Embodying eternal femininity, this sensual fragrance envelops you in a caring embrace.

name: Kiehl's Clearly Corrective™ Dark Spot Solution 50ml
description: Your new favourite go-to fix for dark spots and pigmentation. Formulated with Activated C (a fast-acting form of vitamin C), salicylic acid and peony extract, this serum penetrates the skin rapidly to reduce discolouration and the appearance of acne scars. Suitable for all skin types including sensitive skin.

name: Tom Ford Myrrhe Mystère Eau de Parfum 50ml
description: Perfect for a night out, this warm and spicy unisex fragrance from Tom Ford’s Private Blend collection draws intoxicating notes of mystical myrrh and sweet vanilla together with woody undertones to bestow its wearer with the most luminous aura.

name: Ögon Lady Case Smart Wallet in Rose Gold
description: Security meets elegance with this tough yet lightweight quilted aluminum wallet. Designed to open swiftly in one hand, it fits up to 10 cards and cash, and is RFID-safe, making it the perfect pocket-sized companion while on the go. Size: 10.9 x 7.2 x 1.9cm. Weight: 78g

name: La Mer The Eye Concentrate 15ml
description: With triple the amount of Concentrated Miracle Broth™, this fast-absorbing treatment helps transform the delicate eye area with essential energy and healing hydration to reduce the look of dark circles and lines in 21 days. Lime tea concentrate, the antioxidant powerhouse, helps prevent damage before it begins. The result? An enlightened new eye area — one that looks smoother, brighter and healthier than before. For best results, store the applicator in the fridge before use, for a soothing and refreshing effect.

name: Yves Saint Laurent Libre L’Absolu Platine Eau de Parfum 90ml
description: Light up every room with this fierce, fresh and feminine fragrance. Featuring an intoxicating blend of warm orange blossom from Morocco and minty diva lavender from France, each spritz of this perfume celebrates a woman’s inner strength and freedom.

name: Dolce & Gabbana Velvet Desert Oud Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: Dazzling as a sojourn in the desert, this unisex scent envelops you with warm notes of intoxicating incense, mysterious oud and sweet amber. Part of Dolce & Gabbana’s exclusive Velvet Collection, this fragrance comes in a bottle topped with a gold-trimmed velvet cap, and expresses its designers’ olfactive memories and love for Italy. It is the perfect scent for those seeking to charm and captivate.

name: Maison Lancôme Haute Parfumerie Paris Ôud Bouquet Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: Warm, sweet, and evocative of a walk through a fragrant forest, this fragrance brings together a trio of woods sourced from three continents: Oud wood that has been aged for 20 years, leathery cedarwood and exquisite facets of patchouli. Lavender, honey rose and vanilla weave themselves in between, creating an arresting scent for men and women.

name: Fossil Carraway Gents Watch
description:
An instant classic, the Carraway is a thoughtfully designed timepiece featuring a two-layered dial. A leather strap with soft nubuck lining and a case that curves to the shape of your wrist makes this watch as timeless as it is comfortable. Two-year
international warranty. 30mm

name: Fossil Watch Ring
description: Every wardrobe needs a statement piece, and this watch ring will become your favourite conversation-starting accessory in no time. Bold like a signet ring, it features a gold sunray dial and a gold-tone stainless steel adjustable band, as well as a two-hand movement. A classy timepiece to add an unforgettable pop to every outfit. Two-year international warranty. 15mm

name: NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer Custard Duo 2 x 6ml
description: Look flawless all day long with this bestselling, award-winning concealer. This multi-purpose corrector is infused with NARS’ signature multi-active botanical blend to offer a luminescent finish and moisturising capabilities. It strengthens the skin while evening out imperfections and blemishes, and can also be used to highlight and contour.

name: Maison Margiela Paris Replica Jazz Club Eau de Toilette 100ml
description: Rum and cigars. Dark corners and secret conversations. Relive the thrill of a night out in a secret jazz club with a charismatic, woody bouquet of rum absolute, vanilla bean, tobacco and pink peppercorn. An irresistible scent for the irresistible man.

name: Maison Margiela Paris Replica Lazy Sunday Morning Eau de Toilette 100ml
description: Reminiscent of lazy Sunday mornings spent lingering in bed, gentle notes of lily of the valley, white musk, powdery iris and ambrette seeds combine to envelop you in the warm embrace of fresh cotton sheets, with the sun gently warming your skin. A delicate fragrance suitable for both men and women.

name: Cabeau Air Evolution Inflatable Neck Pillow
description: Relax and snooze in comfort on your travels with Cabeau’s most compact inflatable pillow. Its soft microfibre cover and ergonomic design supports your head in any direction, and packs away into a case no bigger than a drink can — making it the ideal travel companion.

name: Sekonda Ladies’ Watch & Bracelets Gift Set
description: This three-piece set instantly elevates any look, while pairing seamlessly with other jewellery pieces in your wardrobe. Jazz up your outfit with the rose gold watch — which has a quartz movement, a sunray dial and a gorgeous two-tone alloy bracelet — and the two accompanying rose gold bracelets. Two-year warranty. 17mm

name: Tommy Hilfiger Casual Ladies’ Watch
description: Stay on time and in style. This multifunctional luxe sport timepiece for her features a beautiful woven textured dial and a crystal-encrusted bezel, which find a perfect match in its sporty mesh bracelet. Two-year international warranty. 40mm

name: Scentologia Syn.ergy. Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: This unisex fragrance features a harmonious, tropical blend of juicy mango, orange, pear and cassis, which is balanced by elegant notes of saffron and jasmine before settling down into a sensual base of precious amber and musk.

name: Amouage Guidance Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: This unisex fragrance is the result of spellbinding alchemy between rose, frankincense, ambergris and vanilla. Woody, yet floral, it is a scent that exudes quiet confidence, and envelops its wearer in a soft embrace. Guidance is the winner of the prestigious Best Perfume in High Luxury Award at the Belgian Beauty Awards.

name: Beautypro LED Wand 5-in-1 Anti-Ageing Device
description: Unlock your most youthful skin yet with this 5-in-1 anti-ageing beauty wand. Red and blue light technology, microcurrents, high-frequency sonic vibration and thermotherapy come together to smoothen out fine lines, reduce puffiness, and fade blemishes to reveal clear, glowing skin. Rechargeable and perfect for all skin types.

name: Wonderbalm Multi-Purpose Balm 50ml
description: Meet your new favourite all-in-one skincare solution. This multi-purpose marvel protects your skin as a hydrating moisturiser, lip balm, hand and foot balm, hair mask, aftershave, and more. It comes enriched with olive oil, shea butter and antioxidants, and is 100% vegan-certified and cruelty-free.
